by Q6. Summary Table: Compared with 10 years ago (i.e. 2012), is it generally easier or more difficult for women in your country to do each of the following?
Access the contraception they want to use
Decide the contraception they want to use
Discuss consent with a romantic partner (e.g. saying no in an intimate situation)
Discuss pregnancy termination with a doctor or other medical professional
Discuss pregnancy termination with a partner
Discuss pregnancy termination with a family member (e.g. parent, sibling)
